name: The second trial
description:
Entry for Movie Game Jam 2018 based in the second trial scene from "Indiana Jones & The Last crusade".

The goal of the game is to reach the top of the level stepping into the right tiles.

Controls: Mouse.

Notes: 

  • If the game takes too long in generate a level, just restart. The generating algorithm is not fully optimized.
  • The game is incomplete, I would like to improve it but i didn't have the time,
  • Enjoy!
